mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_book( bookname, bookprice, bookauthor, booknum, typeid, pubid, bookpic) VALUES (#{bookname},#{bookprice},#{bookauthor},#{booknum},#{typeid},#{pubid},'')
mapper.select: select t_book.*, t_booktype.id as 'bookType.id',t_booktype.booktype as 'bookType.bookType', t_publisher.id as 'publisher.id',t_publisher.pubname as 'publisher.pubname' FROM t_book inner JOIN t_booktype ON t_book.typeid=t_booktype.id inner JOIN t_publisher ON t_book.pubid=t_publisher.id ORDER BY t_book.id DESC

select t_book.*, t_booktype.id as 'bookType.id',t_booktype.booktype as 'bookType.bookType', t_publisher.id as 'publisher.id',t_publisher.pubname as 'publisher.pubname' FROM t_book inner JOIN t_booktype ON t_book.typeid=t_booktype.id inner JOIN t_publisher ON t_book.pubid=t_publisher.id ORDER BY t_book.id DESC limit ${start},${size}
